about_the_game:
Ever dreamt of playing your non-VR games from Steam using your VR headset? With GameVRoom you can invite up to three friends for multiplayer gaming sessions on a big screen, set up personalized controller bindings, gestures or even build your own control room with virtual props!




COUCH GAMING WITH FRIENDS FROM AFAR
GameVRoom provides a new type of social experience for playing non-VR games in VR:

  • Invite up to three friends in multiplayer mode - only the host needs to own the non-VR game.
  • Play split-screen in “couch co-op”, spectate or control different parts of a single-player game.
  • Talk with your friends over VOIP.
  • Create private sessions or join other gamers in public rooms.




TAILOR-MAKE YOUR GAMEPLAY EXPERIENCE
Lots of unique tools and features give you the ability to:

  • Emulate a mouse, keyboard, or gamepad for seamless movement in ways tailored for VR.
  • Bind controller actions, poses and gestures like twisting your hand or reaching over your shoulder to perform actions on your PC.
  • Create virtual buttons and place them anywhere in the environment to build your own control surface, then share your layouts in the community library.


STILL IN EARLY ACCESS
More tools, props and options for personalization will be added for you to play your favorite games in the most immersive ways! You may also encounter bugs that we'll work on fixing over the course of the Early Access period.

Please provide your feedback and suggestions on what you would like to see added or fixed on the GameVRoom Discord server:

You can also submit your feature requests or bug reports on our Feedback board, found here:
detailed_description:
Known Issues

  • Some games may cause GameVRoom to drop to a very low framerate. This can usually be resolved by enabling VSync or adjusting other graphics settings in the game.
  • A few competitive games, such as Valorant, may block mouse and keyboard emulation from GameVRoom, but most games allow it. Some games that block mouse and keyboard may support gamepad emulation instead.
  • When hosting a multiplayer game, other players may hear their own voice getting streamed back to them along with the rest of the audio coming from the host.
  • Using Grip on the Valve Index controllers is very sensitive by default. To fix this, activate our custom bindings at: SteamVR Settings -> Controllers -> Show old bindings UI -> GameVRoom -> Shared binding from Really Interactive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Systems with hybrid graphics cards (integrated and dedicated GPUs) are not supported.
